name: Shorter HEX code detection
description:
Detects if a string is a hex color code (length 3 or 6).
Extremely short, but works perfectly!
content:
Detects if a string is a hex color code (length 3 or 6).
Extremely short, but works perfectly!
W/ #:
 6: #00ffff
 3: #F0a
W/O #:
 6: 0a4379
 3: 0ad

By htmlguy - htmlguy.cu.cc
author: htmlguy
